item.description:
Chris sent out an email saying

"Hi All,

My wife and I just joined the group and are wondering if anyone would like to meet tomorrow (Thursday) for happy hour drinks at the 21st Amendment on Beacon Hill around 6pm. It's a cool bar and pretty accessible by T. Let me know if you're interested.

Chris
http://couples.meetup...
ckmerritt@gmail.com"

I'll be there around 6:30 ordering food and drinks, you guys can call me at 203-577-7442.
See you there

Sun
item.name: Happy Hour Tomorrow (Thursday)
